forecasting module¶

forecasting.create_forecast_dataframe(crypto_df, model_fit, steps)¶

generate a pandas DataFrame containing a forecast based on the input DataFrame and model.

Parameters:

  • crypto_df – Historical cryptocurrency data as a pandas DataFrame with columns [‘date’, ‘price’].

  • model_fit – A trained forecasting model.

  • steps – Number of forecast steps (hours) to generate.

Returns:

A pandas DataFrame with columns [‘date’, ‘price’] containing the forecast data.

forecrypt
